pullRequest.title: GH-1867 pass parserconfig to protocol session
pullRequest.bodyText:
GitHub issue resolved: #1867 
Briefly describe the changes proposed in this PR:

SPARQLConnection passes its parser config on to client so it can be used for tweaking strictness of result processing.
added simple unit test

commit.message: GH-1867 pass parserconfig to protocol session

nodes.bodyText: Haven’t seen this part of mockito. This tests that the setParserConfig method has been called exactly once with config?
